project.name: builder-log-reader
project.description:
This example demonstrates the builder design pattern.
Background Story There are machines that generates various log files. These files are plain text file and poorly formatted. They are created to read by the users one-by-one. Of course the machine manufacturer provides a processing tool for these log files but it is very expensive. Different manufacturers use different formats and their automatic processing is difficult for employees. So we are hired to create a processing tool that can read data from various file formats.
Each log contains i) Description of the machine ii) Historical data.
